Panier de tempuras pourris

傷んだ天麩羅のカゴ盛り

A Basket of Spoiled Tempura
整籃變壞的天婦羅
整籃變壞的天婦羅
A Basket of Spoiled Tempura
kDesc
Tempura spoiled due to the toxic gas of the spirits. It seems that it is inedible.[#Legal]
Tempuras rendus immangeables car exposés à du poison de monstre. Complètement pourris. [#Legal]
Tempura, welcher durch das Gift der Monster verdorben wurde. Er ist völlig verfault. [#Legal]
Della tempura contaminata dal veleno dei mostri. È completamente marcia. [#Legal]
Tempura que se estropeó debido al veneno de un monstruo. Está completamente podrida. [#Legal]
モノノケ達の毒気にあてられて傷んでしまった天ぷら。完全に腐敗しているようだ。[#Legal]
요괴의 독기에 닿아 상해버린 튀김. 완전히 부패해 있는 것 같다. [#Legal]
Tempura spoiled due to the toxic gas of the spirits. It seems that it is inedible.[#Legal]
因妖怪的毒氣而壞掉的天婦羅，看來已經完全壞掉。[#Legal]
因妖怪的毒氣而壞掉的天婦羅，看來已經完全壞掉。[#Legal]
Tempura spoiled due to the toxic gas of the spirits. It seems that it is inedible.[#Legal]
